channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fighting for Justice for Japan’s ‘Comfort Women’
item.description: Mina Watanabe has made it her life’s work to tell the stories of the women who were sexually enslaved by the Japanese military before and during World...

item.title: Elon Musk’s offer to bring home stranded astronauts never reached the space station, say NASA astronauts who are still in orbit after 9 months
item.description: Musk said the astronauts could’ve been rescued sooner but the Biden administration rejected his assistance.

item.title: A Youth Leader From Chile Fights Discrimination Across the Globe
item.description: Isidora Uribe Silva tried as a teen to promote inclusive spaces for girls, women and disabled people in Chile. She has taken her mission to the U.N. a...

item.title: 7-Eleven Taps American Executive to Help Keep It Out of Canadian Hands
item.description: The Japanese owner of the chain also announced a plan to list its U.S. convenience store business as it tries to fend off a Canadian retailer’s $47 bi...

item.title: Inside Trump’s Deportation Push, and the U.S. Holds Talks With Hamas
C.I.A. Begins Firing Recently Hired Officers
item.description: Some newer employees have been summoned to an off-site location and asked to surrender their credentials.

item.title: Trump’s team promised governments would ‘eat’ its tariffs. Execs say they’re passing on at least 50% to consumers
item.description: Warren Buffett and Steve Cohen warned consumers would be footing the bill for Trump's trade war, and business bosses have now confirmed they plan to p...

item.title: During the War in Ukraine, a Military Orchestra Has a Key Task
item.description: As Ukrainian casualties spiral after years of war, a military band has the melancholy but key task of bidding farewell to troops and raising morale.

item.title: Utah becomes first state to pass legislation requiring app stores to verify user ages and get parental consent for minors
item.description: The bill has pitted Meta against app store giants Apple and Google over who should be responsible for verifying ages.

item.title: ‘The pint is safe with us’: Under threat from a change to metric, British Lords vote to safeguard the cherished measure
item.description: 'The pint is safe with us': Under threat of metrication, British Lords pass legal safeguard for the pint of beer

item.title: Trump asks farmers and consumers to ‘bear with me’ as they brace for unpredictable tariff hit to their wallets
item.description: If farmers aren’t able to move as much meat overseas because of tariffs, they can seek to sell more domestically -- but they’ll likely have to discoun...

item.title: South Korean Fighter Jets Mistakenly Bomb Village, Leaving 7 Injured
item.description: Fifteen people in the South Korean village of Nogok, near the North Korean border, were injured in the bombing, which happened during a joint drill wi...
